title: Dataset FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
body:
![screen](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40465821/69708836-5b2acc80-110d-11ea-8ff2-069a1e93dabe.JPG)
 
I place datasets as on screenshot , but when I run 
python train.py --config-file configs/mobilenet_v2_ssd320_voc0712.yaml

got 

> Traceback (most recent call last):
>   File "train.py", line 114, in <module>
>     main()
>   File "train.py", line 105, in main
>     model = train(cfg, args)
>   File "train.py", line 42, in train
>     train_loader = make_data_loader(cfg, is_train=True, distributed=args.distributed, max_iter=max_iter, start_iter=arguments['iteration'])
>   File "C:\Users\a.belousov\Desktop\ssd_lite\SSD-master\ssd\data\build.py", line 34, in make_data_loader
>     datasets = build_dataset(dataset_list, transform=train_transform, target_transform=target_transform, is_train=is_train)
>   File "C:\Users\a.belousov\Desktop\ssd_lite\SSD-master\ssd\data\datasets\__init__.py", line 28, in build_dataset
>     dataset = factory(**args)
>   File "C:\Users\a.belousov\Desktop\ssd_lite\SSD-master\ssd\data\datasets\voc.py", line 29, in __init__
>     self.ids = VOCDataset._read_image_ids(image_sets_file)
>   File "C:\Users\a.belousov\Desktop\ssd_lite\SSD-master\ssd\data\datasets\voc.py", line 62, in _read_image_ids
>     with open(image_sets_file) as f:
> FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'datasets\\VOC2007\\ImageSets\\Main\\trainval.txt'

I dont change anything in original code , mayby it is wrong locations of dataset?
and where I should plase it?
